column2: "Ohh, helloo! Heheh, you should put some energy into greeting people!"
"It's a festival, after all! It's been ages since something like this happened."
"Lisa loves festivals. After all, nobody cares about the little details if it's a festival!"
"You can do whatever you want at a festival, and all will be forgiven. Heheh."
"That's why Lisa loves festivals. Everyone loves festivals, don't they."
"It doesn't matter what it's really about, if there's some secret reason for holding it."
"As long as Lisa can have fun, that's enough."
"So you should have loads and loads of fun with Lisa!"
